content:
The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 17.03.24 is approximately:

  • personnel - 430740 (+1160) persons liquidated
  • tanks - 6790 (+11)
  • combat armored vehicles - 12997 (+24)
  • artillery systems - 10634 (+28)
  • RSWW - 1017 (0)
  • air defense facilities - 720 (+1)
  • aircraft - 347 (0)
  • helicopters - 325 (0)
  • UAV Operative-tactical level-8272 (+4)
  • Winged missiles - 1922 (0)
  • ships / boats - 26 (0)
  • submarines - 1 (0)
  • automobile equipment and tanks - 14073 (+49)
  • Special Technique - 1723 (+11)

Data are clarified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source: General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 17.03.24.
title: Minus 1160 invaders, 11 tanks and 28 artistems: loss of Russian Federation per day
author: Army Inform
